idea-plugin.name: Silex Plugin
idea-plugin.description:
Support for Silex PHP Framework.

Beta release.

Plugin needs pimple container dump (pimple.json) in project root directory, to create it follow instruction at https://github.com/Sorien/silex-pimple-dumper
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.9.8

  • Autocomplete fine tuning (whole pimple container should be covered)
  • Common functionality covered by tests

0.9.7

  • SubContainer type resolution and autocomplete
  • Resolve constants in ArrayAccess

0.9.6

  • Resolve anonymous function parameters inside extend/factory/share method
  • Raw method autocomplete

0.9.5

  • Allow disable plugin per project
  • Refactored Container loading
  • Resolve pimple as a class variable

0.9.4

  • Refactored Type resolution
  • Improved Pimple Container Base class detection
